key.name: format
key.summary: Selecting predefined date and time formats
key.description: Various preset date and time formats (long, short, ISO and language-specific)

key.name: user-format
key.summary: Custom user-defined date and time format
key.description: Allows the user to specify their own format string using standard strftime placeholders (e.g. %Y for year, %m for month, %d for day, %H for hour, %M for minute, %S for second).
